value.title: StarCraft 2: Clem's Terran vs Zerg is INSANE! (Solar vs Clem)
value.excerpt: Professional match of StarCraft 2 between Solar and Clem. In this Terran versus Zerg we watch Clem take control of the early game, but Solar managed to stay alive and strikes back in the late game.
